Training for CBO in SICHREM

February 5, 2024 No Comments

SICHREM – a community-based organization in Bangalore received a series of training on resource mobilization and organizational sustainability organized by Smile Foundation. The multifaceted training program delved into critical areas such as visibility building, sustainability
